message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust later if you think that's unfair.
I think a 55/45 split in my favor is a more fair starting point.  Let's see if we can work something out.
I'm willing to move a bit closer to your proposal, but I think a 52.5/47.5 split is a fairer starting point.  Let's keep negotiating.
